name: Notion Resume
description: Go straight to interview stageGetting your first job is one of the most challenging steps in your career. You are competing against hundreds of other candidates, some of whom may have equal or better experiences.That's why it's important to stand out from the crowd right from the start. And what better way to do that than with an original and visually appealing online resume?This template has been designed with minimalism in mind. Recruiters spend countless hours reviewing candidates, and while
features: Work experiences, education; Contact details; Skills, Projects & Hobbies; Minimalistic; Easy to edit; Notion-powered website
